title: Unable to change from USB charging to media transfer when connected to PC
content: I want to transfer many files from my PC to my pixel 4a. When I connect my phone to my Pc with a usb cable , when I scroll to bring down the menu, I do not see any option to change the setting from Usb charging to media transfer, or however it's called (i don't see this menu) .
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
